===Etymology===
Borrowed from a Central Asian language during the {{w|Han Dynasty}} ({{zh-ref|Laufer, 1967}}). Compare {{cog|bo|བུག་སུག||[[alfalfa]]; bird's-foot trefoil}}, {{cog|lbj|||tr=bukhsukh|''Nepeta salviaefolia''}}.
